de.fhb.sailboat.mission

Class HoldAngleToWindTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhb.sailboat.mission.HoldAngleToWindTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task

    public class HoldAngleToWindTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements Task
    Task for driving a course only based on the wind. The boat holds a specific angle relative to the current apparent wind. The task does not finish.
    Author:
    hscheel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HoldAngleToWindTask(int angle)
      Creates a new instance with the angle that should be hold towards the wind.

    • Method Summary

      The task does not finish, so false is returned.
